LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
[4] Woodlawn-bound trains skip 161 St, 167 St, 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St

Days, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Wed to Fri, Apr 11 - 13

For service to these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a
Woodlawn-bound [4].

Alternate travel notes:
From 161 St, take the [D] to nearby stations.
From 176 St, take the Bx32 bus. Transfer to the [4] at Burnside Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Days, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Fri, until May 11

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
